      • changePermission

        public void changePermission(java.lang.String userName,
                             java.lang.Integer grId,
                             java.lang.Integer userLvl)
        this method change permissions of a user p of a group grId.

        The person calling this method must belong to the same group the person she want to change and have a aythorization of 2 in this group

        Parameters:
        userName - is the userName of the person to upgrade/downgrade.
        userLvl - is the new levels of permission for the person
        grId - is the Id of the group.

      • createGroup

        public int createGroup(java.lang.String person,
                       java.lang.String grName)
        this method create a new Group.

        the person that call this method get his list of group updated and get highest level of authorization for this group (2).
        The group's members are updated with the person calling this method

        Parameters:
        grName - is the name of the new group
        Returns:
        the identifier grId of the group created
